#summary API Request Format

= API Request Format =

All requests are implemented via HTTP GET calls.

== Syntax: ==

{{{
GET /resource.response-format?query=params HTTP/1.1
Host: otter.topsy.com
}}}

The url of the request can be broken down into three parts: [Resources resource-name], [ResponseFormat]response-format], and query parameters.
